title: Server Down?
body: I just in the middle of a blind draft game when I lost connection, I waited a while and disconnected, then whenever I clicked reconnect I got a could no connect to server error. My internet is working and I can load webpages fine. When I try logging in I get the same error. And when I go to check the server status here: https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US I get This Site Cannot be Reached status.leagueoflegends.com's DNS address could not be reached, but all other webpages load fine

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  Your internet might work fine, but your network might be having trouble specifically connected to our servers.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some possibilities and get you back in game.  Let me know if you still have issues afterwards!
I ended up being out for the rest of the game. But I did some things in command prompt and reset my DNS which fixed it. Thanks
